location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that Captain Lockett has arrived and departed Bushire, the Captain having obtained permission from Sir Gore Ouseley to travel in Persia. It further notes that as per the wishes of the Bombay Government, he has been offered every suitable means of assistance at the Residency's disposal.
